docs.text:
Welcome to 702nADOS


testbed for an adaptive distributed operating system


702nADOS repository structure


702nADOS code structure


How to contribute to the 702nADOS code


Vagrant instructions




Packages required:


vagrant




virtualbox






Inside operating-system folder:




change "PROJECT" inside Makefile to your needs


adjust memory size and number of cores inside Vagrant file to fit your hardware


run "ip a" on your local machine and change the dev option inside bootstrap.h to your LAN adapter


vagrant up (Wait until it finished. This may take some time. Machine will throw a tty error when finished...)


run "vagrant ssh" to log into vm


inside vm run "cd /vagrant"


and run "make run"


the compiled image will be accessible via PXE boot


all files for the SD card for Pandaboard to run PXE boot are inside the Panda SD folder


a direct LAN connection between the Pandaboard and the local machine is requiered




Coding Standards
